nodes.documentation:
modifiers used as a  circuit breaker in the contract
we can end the token sale when needed => no bidding can occur
nodes.name: stopInEmergency

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "correct amount of ether not sent"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "only admin can end the token sale"

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct BiddingContract.Product storage ref[] storage ref
literal_string "seller can only finalize the bid"
